title: Guadalupe Mountains National Park: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar           Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 4 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Guadalupe Mountains National Park Natural Dyes Workshop      Time: 4:00 PM to 6:00 PM Location: Carlsbad Museum & Art Center Fees: Free     Saturday, August 20, 2016 Join artists to learn how to create and use natural dyes from natural materials like plants! View Details      Guadalupe Mountains National Park Centennial Sunrise Service on Guadalupe Peak      Time: 3:00 PM to 10:30 AM Location: Guadalupe Peak Fees: $5 Entrance Fee     Wednesday, August 24, 2016 Join rangers on a backpacking trip up Guadalupe Peak and hike to the summit for a sunrise service to celebrate the National Park Service centennial. View Details      Guadalupe Mountains National Park Land Loom Project      Time: 8:00 AM to 11:00 AM Location: Frijole Ranch Lawn Fees: Free     Thursday, August 25, 2016 Drop in for a free morning art session. Join artists Sarita Westrup and Analise Minjarez in painting and weaving a community tapestry. No experience necessary.  View Details      Guadalupe Mountains National Park National Park Service Birthday      Location: Guadalupe Mountains National Park Fees: Fee Free     Thursday, August 25, 2016 Celebrate our birthday with a fee free weekend!
